concept.title: Before You Begin
concept.shortdesc: Before you start this tutorial, you'll need to do a few things:

ol.li:
tutorialprerequisitesDownload sample data.
You can download sample data from the StreamSets website. You'll need a login to the password-protected section of the site - it just takes a moment to set up an account.
Sample data URL: <<add StreamSets download URL>>URL

Set up a directory local to the , and save the sample data in the directory.
Let's use the same directory for the source, destination, and error record files. Make sure the user who started the has read and write permission for the directory.
The should be installed and running.

To create and run the pipeline, you should have a login with the admin role or both the creator and manager roles.
If using the default accounts shipped with the , you can use the admin login: admin / admin.
